hero.title: The Latest Complex
hero.subtitle: In the Heart of Jeddah
hero.description: We provide comprehensive maintenance services for all types of vehicles with the highest standards of quality and efficiency

about.title: About the Project
about.description: Al Nakheel Auto Maintenance Complex is the largest complex of car maintenance centers and workshops in Jeddah, providing comprehensive services for all car maintenance needs

companyInfo.title: Company Information
companyInfo.description2: Al-Nakheel auto Maintenance Complex has been implemented at a high-end and integrated engineering and construction level on an area of 20,500 square meters.All units include a spacious operating area ideal for all maintenance and repair works, designed with a smart and flexible architectural and construction systems that can be increased and expanded according to the work's need, in addition to providing all elements of infrastructure such as electricity, water, parking and spacious traffic spaces for cars and large trucks, in addition to the presence of upper spaces (mezzanine) usable as administrative offices, storage areas and soft maintenance works.
companyInfo.description: Al-Nakheel Auto Maintenance Complex is the first project of Mozoon Al Motaqadimah Real Estate Company, and it was generally supervised, starting from engineering designs works and supervising construction works until the completion of its construction to the start of leasing and its management by Darat Al-Qamra Consulting and Business Development Company.

advantages.title: Key Advantages of Al Nakheel Auto Maintenance Complex

location.title: Location
location.description: Located in the center of Jeddah, with easy access from all directions - north, south, west, and east. The complex is close to major residential areas, business centers, and auto parts markets in Jeddah.

licenses.title: Activities and Legal Licenses
licenses.description: The project is situated in a regulated area, with all necessary organizational licenses from Jeddah Municipality for all types of car maintenance, including mechanical, electrical, bodywork, and painting services.

facilities.title: Facilities, offices, parking and ease of movement
facilities.description: It provides office units for each unit and is equipped with all the special facilities necessary to obtain an integrated, ideal and economical work environment.
facilities.description2: It provides all logistical needs from large movement spaces, ease of entry and exit, parking lots, cars, large and small trucks, with sufficient spaces allocated for each unit designated as parking lots.

security.title: Security and firefighting systems & public utilities
security.description: Providing guards and security systems around 24 hours with advanced surveillance cameras to monitor and secure the complex from all sides to ensure a safe and comfortable work environment.
security.description2: Installing all firefighting equipment and systems with the highest engineering specifications.
security.description3: Providing all services and infrastructure (electricity, water, sewage and industrial sewage).

spaces.title: Spaces
spaces.heading: Integrated Office and Operational Spaces
spaces.subheading: Smart Design for All Business Needs

office.title: Office units for each unit equipped with all necessary facilities to obtain an integrated, ideal and economical work environment.
office.subtitle: Modern office design providing a comfortable and productive work environment, with consideration for economic aspects and operational efficiency.

operational.title: Large operational spaces suitable for various types of car maintenance activities (mechanical, electrical, body work, painting).
operational.subtitle: Flexible operational space design allowing for dedicated areas for each type of maintenance, while ensuring safety and efficiency requirements.

parking.title: Parking for cars and large and small trucks, with sufficient spaces allocated for each unit designated as parking lots.
parking.subtitle: Comprehensive parking system ensuring smooth traffic flow and organized vehicle access, with appropriate spaces allocated for each vehicle type.

electricity.title: Advanced electricity network that meets the needs of all types of equipment and devices used in car maintenance workshops.
electricity.subtitle: Smart electrical system providing stable and sufficient power for all equipment, while maintaining safety and efficiency standards.

water.title: Integrated water and sewage network that ensures a clean and healthy work environment.
water.subtitle: Comprehensive water and sewage management system ensuring clean water supply and safe waste disposal.

industrial.title: Specialized industrial drainage system that complies with environmental standards for the safe disposal of car maintenance waste.
industrial.subtitle: Advanced environmental solutions for industrial waste disposal, maintaining environmental protection and implementing global best practices.

security.title: Security and Safety
security.heading: Advanced Security Systems
security.subheading: Comprehensive Protection for Complex and Staff

guards.title: Providing 24-hour security guards and systems to ensure a safe work environment.
guards.subtitle: Highly trained security team with integrated monitoring systems to ensure complex security and safety.

cameras.title: Advanced surveillance cameras to monitor and secure the complex from all sides.
cameras.subtitle: Comprehensive monitoring system using latest technologies, with full coverage of all complex areas.

fire.title: Installation of all firefighting equipment and systems with the highest engineering specifications.
fire.subtitle: Integrated fire protection system including smoke detectors, fire extinguishers, and early warning systems.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to commonly asked questions about our services and facilities

1.question: What services does Al Nakheel Auto Maintenance Complex offer?
1.answer: We offer comprehensive car maintenance services including general maintenance, engine repair, electrical systems, air conditioning, and more. Our complex is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities and experienced technicians.

2.question: What are your working hours?
2.answer: Our complex operates from 8:00 AM to 10:00 PM, seven days a week. We are committed to providing flexible service hours to accommodate our customers' needs.

3.question: Do you accept all car makes and models?
3.answer: Yes, we service all car makes and models. Our technicians are trained to handle various vehicle types and are equipped with the necessary tools and equipment for different car brands.

4.question: How can I book an appointment?
4.answer: You can book an appointment through our website, mobile app, or by calling our customer service hotline. Walk-ins are also welcome, but appointments are recommended to ensure prompt service.
